javamodule.description: Validate sorting order based on given xpath, sort order (asc/desc) and boundaries of displayed price ranges.

parameter.name: xpath
parameter.desc: xpath which leads to all prices for comparison

parameter.name: substringBeforeLowerBoundary
parameter.desc: text which is displayed in front of the price

parameter.name: substringBeforeUpperBoundary
parameter.desc: text which is displayed between a price range
